uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.timer

Class TimeClosable

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.timer.TimeClosable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class TimeClosable
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    A AutoCloseable wrapper to allows timers to be closed automatically. Its written to handle a null TimerService
     

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TimeClosable(AppContext conn, java.lang.String name)
      Create with the default TimerService If no TimerService is enabled the TimeClosable will have no effect.
      TimeClosable(AppContext conn, java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> name_supplier)
      Create with the default TimerService If no TimerService is enabled the TimeClosable will have no effect.
      TimeClosable(TimerService service, java.lang.String name)
      start the named timer (if the service is not null).
      TimeClosable(TimerService service, java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> name_supplier)
      start the named timer (if the service is not null).
